steps.title: Put the installation CD into your CD drive to run the installation wizard.
steps.content: Put the installation CD into your CD drive to run the installation wizard.

steps.title: Click on the installation button ("Install Warcraft III" or "Install Warcraft III:
steps.content: Click on the installation button ("Install Warcraft III" or "Install Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne").

steps.title: Enter your name and the CD key found on the cover or box in which the CD was purchased.
steps.content: Enter your name and the CD key found on the cover or box in which the CD was purchased.

steps.title: Browse to the directory where you want to install the game and hit "OK."
steps.content: Browse to the directory where you want to install the game and hit "OK."

steps.title: Wait for the game to install.
steps.content: Wait for the game to install. The status bars will indicate the progress of the installation.

steps.title: Create a desktop shortcut if you want by clicking "Yes" in the window that pops up.
steps.content: Create a desktop shortcut if you want by clicking "Yes" in the window that pops up. Otherwise you can just click "No" and open the game later through the directory where it is installed.

steps.title: Get the latest patch from the Internet.
steps.content: Get the latest patch from the Internet. You can get it from the official DoTA website or another source of your choice. You have to download the full patch if you are installing it for the first time.

steps.title: Open the patch after it has downloaded completely.
steps.content: Open the patch after it has downloaded completely. The patch will start to install automatically. Hit the "OK" button once installation has been completed.

steps.title: Download DoTA from the Internet.
steps.content: Download DoTA from the Internet. The official DoTA website has many download mirrors to provide fast downloads to multiple users at once. Remember the location where you are saving the downloaded file.

steps.title: Move the downloaded file to the download directory of the Warcraft program in which you want to play the DoTA game.
steps.content: Move the downloaded file to the download directory of the Warcraft program in which you want to play the DoTA game. The directory is usually "C:\Program Files\Warcraft III\Maps\Download" unless you had changed it during the game's installation process. The DoTA map has now been successfully installed for your chosen World of Warcraft game but you should make some adjustments before playing it.

steps.title: Open Warcraft and click on "Options" in the main menu to go to the Options menu.
steps.content: Open Warcraft and click on "Options" in the main menu to go to the Options menu.

steps.title: Change the Video Settings to match the DoTA virtual environment.
steps.content: Change the Video Settings to match the DoTA virtual environment. Gamma and Lights sets the brightness of your screen and the light ratio within the game. Resolution, Model Detail, Animation Quality, Particles and Texture Quality can be used to enhance the detailing of objects in the virtual world. Spell Detail should be set to High so you know when there are spells nearby.

steps.title: Configure your Gameplay Options to gain better control while playing in the DoTA environment.
steps.content: Configure your Gameplay Options to gain better control while playing in the DoTA environment. Mouse Scroll adjusts the sensitivity of your mouse cursor. Keyboard Scroll adjusts the sensitivity level for keyboard buttons. Always Show Health Bars shows the health of your character at all times while playing the game. Automatically Save Replays saves replays in the replays folder automatically.

steps.title: Customize your Sound Options to match your personal preferences and audio system capabilities.
steps.content: Customize your Sound Options to match your personal preferences and audio system capabilities.

steps.title: Join a DoTA game online to start playing with other users.
steps.content: Join a DoTA game online to start playing with other users.
